citations.narrative:
The fencing for the cow enclosure consists of wooden vertical and horizontal posts, however some sections consist of
metal panels affixed together. Sharp edges and significant gaps between the panels were noted. In addition, some
vertical fencing posts were leaning significantly causing the fence to sag. Sharp metal edges and gaps between panels
could cause injury or allow an animal to become trapped or potentially escape from the enclosure. Outdoor housing
facilities must be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to
contain the animals. The facility must correct this issue.
*********Correct by December 1, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a) 
   
Facilities, general. 
The fencing for the cow enclosure consists of wooden vertical and horizontal posts, however some sections consist of 
metal panels affixed together. Sharp edges and significant gaps between the panels were noted. In addition, some 
vertical fencing posts were leaning significantly causing the fence to sag. Sharp metal edges and gaps between panels 
could cause injury or allow an animal to become trapped or potentially escape from the enclosure. Outdoor housing 
facilities must be structurally sound and shall be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury and to 
contain the animals. The facility must correct this issue.  
*********Correct by December 1, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
 n
